mapper.insert: insert into establish (establishcode, establishnamekor, establishnameeng, status, slipstatus, clientstatus, usestatus) values (#{establishcode},#{establishnamekor},#{establishnameeng},#{status} ,#{slipstatus},#{clientstatus},#{usestatus})
mapper.select: select establishcode, establishnamekor, establishnameeng, status, slipstatus, clientstatus, usestatus from establish
select establishcode, establishnamekor, establishnameeng, status, slipstatus, clientstatus, usestatus from establish where establishcode = #{establishcode}
